title: Osher Lifelong Learning Institute - OLLI at Penn State
text: Members of the OLLI at Penn State Outdoor Art Group will be showcasing their work at an art installation highlighted by a public reception on Thursday, September 18. Courses Courses - Explore and register for courses. Special Interest Groups Special Interest Groups - Join a special interest group and meet regularly with your peers around a shared area of interest. Social and Special Events Social and Special Events - Stay connected by attending social and special events throughout the year. Travel Opportunities Travel Opportunities - Join OLLI for local excursions, international adventures, and everything in between. Membership Membership - Discover the benefits of membership and learn how to join OLLI at Penn State. Teaching and Volunteering Teaching and Volunteering - Learn about exciting opportunities for volunteers and instructors.
